programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep29
programme.desc: Rupert and the Dancing Shoes - Raggety wants new shoes but can't afford them so Ping Pong tries to jazz up the ones he's wearing but her spell goes wrong and the shoes dance off with Raggety inside them and unable to stop. Will Rupert and Ping Pong be able to stop Raggety in time before the shoes carry him one step too far, into danger?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep30
programme.desc: Rupert and the Oldest Tree - Rupert is on a hunt for leaves to fill his new wall chart. He meets Raggety who offers to help him find a strange star-shaped leaf from a magical tree the oldest tree in Nutwood. The Fox Twins don't think much of leaf hunting. They overhear Rupert's plans and decide to play a trick on Rupert and Raggety. But their trick backfires when Raggety does some elf magic and Freddie vanishes into thin air. How will Rupert and Raggety find Freddie and get him back to Freda? And what of their search for the oldest tree in the forest?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep31
programme.desc: Rupert and the Clockwork Dragon - Ming is hurt when Rupert and friends appear to prefer Bill's new toy dragon to her. But when the toy gets them lost in the woods they discover there are some things that only a real dragon can do.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep32
programme.desc: Rupert and the Moon Adventure - With the sun low in the sky, Rupert waves to Ping Pong, Bill, Edward and Ming as they join him at his cottage. They are all going to stay up late to see something very special an eclipse of the moon. Bill is just explaining what an eclipse is when Raggety arrives. In his impatience, he does not want to wait for the moon to rise. He wants to see it straight away. Raggety does elf magic to see the moon at once but promptly vanishes. The others think he is playing a trick and hiding from them, but when Bill looks through the telescope, keen to see the start of the eclipse he gets a shock. Raggety has got his wish to see the moon. His magic has taken him there! How will Rupert and friends get him back down before the eclipse shrinks the moon down to nothing? It is a race against time to save their little elf friend.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep29
programme.desc: How Can We Make The Most Beautiful Garden Ever? - Poor Mimi! Her normally beautiful garden is all messy and full of swirly piles of earth. She's really upset and Jess promises to her help her make it the most beautiful garden ever! Raking away the swirls doesn't work, they just come back! Jess and Mimi realise that worms are making the swirly piles of earth. Mimi wants to move them away but they go back underground before she can catch them. When it rains the worms come back and Jess and Mimi gather up the worms in a bucket and take them to live in the orchard by a patch of scrappy flowers. The garden still isn't looking at it's best though! After the worms have gone Mimi's flowers go all droopy. Willow explains that worms make help make the soil rich and good for plants and that's what makes the flowers bloom. Jess remembers that the worms had come out when it rained. They water the ground to bring the worms up to the surface again. The worms agree to come back to Mimi's garden and soon her garden is beautiful again. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep30
programme.desc: Why Are There Little Hills In The Orchard? - Jess and the pups have been looking after the orchard while Willow's been on holiday but the day she's due back the orchard is full of little piles of earth. What's making them? That's the Big Question. Jess wonders if someone put them there. He asks Mimi, who's making a pile of earth while she digs a hole. She tells him she's going to plant an apple tree. Maybe someone's been planting new apple trees in the orchard thinks Jess. But when he looks carefully there are no holes or newly planted trees. Horace the hoppy frog suggests that maybe it's an invisible digger who's digging underground. Billie the little mouse arrives and tells Jess that the little piles of earth are called molehills. Jess works out that the piles of earth are in a line. Maybe someone is digging a tunnel underground so they can travel right across the orchard. They keep very quiet and a tiny mole pops out above ground. That's who's been making piles of earth in the orchard. They've answered the question. Hooray!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep31
programme.desc: Why Are There So Many Ladybirds? - One winter morning Jess finds lots of ladybird in his barn. Why are they there? That's the Big Question! Mimi tells him that she has lots of ladybirds in her garden in the summer. They're always hungry and brilliant for the plants because they eat all the greenfly. Maybe they're looking for greenfly in his barn? Jess doesn't think so. There are no greenfly in the barn. He goes to ask Baa and Billie for help. They're saying goodbye to Little Bird who's flying away to a warmer country for the winter. Jess thinks maybe the ladybirds are gathering to fly away too and rushes back to his barn to say goodbye. But when he gets there he finds that the ladybirds are now all huddled together and fast asleep. What's going on? Jess goes to ask Willow and finds a hedgehog sleeping under some leaves near the stable. Willow explains that some animals find it hard to find food in the winter, especially if they can't store it, so they eat as much as they can and then go to sleep during the winter. It's called hibe

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Perfume - After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The Children's Fete - The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Aquarium - Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep154
programme.desc: No Panic ! - Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep156
programme.desc: Bubu's Portrait - Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a surprise gift. As she is missing a colour, she leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher arrives and finds the abandoned painting, he decides to take it to Bubu's.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Feelin' Filipino - Lola is missing her hometown in the Philippines, so Josh surprises her by bringing the Philippines to the house! We explore Filipino culture and family traditions as we play Blue's Clues.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Pups Save a Blimp / Pups Save a Chili Cook-Out - Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger who plans ot use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom. // Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Rocky Saves Himself - Rocky must rescue himself when he has been stranded on an Island full of trash by Humdinger.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Muffin in space / Fizzy Frenzy - Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home. // Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Paddington Runs the Caf / Paddington Makes a Film - Paddington says he will watch the cafe, so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Guacamole - Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Mission PAW: Pups Save a Royal Concert / Mission PAW: Pups Save the Princess' Pals - Luke Stars goes missing before his Royal Concert in Barkingburg and Sweetie attempts to take over the Concert! // Animals are over running Barkingburg Castle while the Princess is away. It's up to Ryder and the Paw Patrol to get them under control!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep521
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cuckoo Clock / Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House - Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Turtle Tour / Honey Bear / The Science Pair - Turtle gives Gran-Gran a tour of his favorite amusement park. // When Bossy's cousin Honey Bear comes to visit, he struggles to be a a good friend. // Bossy and Turtle try to make the coolest science fair project so they can become hall monitors.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game - When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Three King's Day - It's Three Kings Day and Larimar is abuzz with holiday cheer! But when Bonnie Bones kidnaps a camel belonging to one of the Three Kings, it's up to Santiago and his crew to stop Bonnie from ruining the holiday.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Pirate Party - When Pepito magically gifts Escarlata legs, she finally gets the chance to crash her first Larimar party!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep606
programme.desc: George's Racing Car - It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep607
programme.desc: The Little Boat - Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Sandpit - Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep609
programme.desc: Night Animals - It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Mirrors - George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Musical! - In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Lifeguard Blaze! - Today, Blaze and AJ are on a mission to become Lifeguards. But it'll take four daring rescues to achieve their official Lifeguard badge and only the bravest monster trucks have what it takes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Pups Save a Snowboard Competition / Pups Save a Chicken of the Sea - Jake and Everest are excited for the Snowboard Competition, until they see the course is buried under a blanket of snow. // When the PAW Patrol sets out to retrieve Cap'n Turbot's sunken diving bell, they meet a giant Sea Slug!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pizza / Pups Save Skye - Alex and Mr. Porter are delivering pizza dough for a big party when the van spins out of control. Pups to the rescue! // Skye is on her way to Jake's Mountain when she crash lands in the snow. Ryder calls Everest to save the day!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Slobber Slug - A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost - Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's caf, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector - It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Night at the Bluseum - It's the night of the big Bluseum opening, and just as Josh unveils Blue's masterpiece, he discovers that it's missing! He must play Blue's Clues to crack this caper and get Blue's painting back!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Sky Art / The Great Race - Sir Steel is upset with Lola's sky art as it affects the popularity of his hat stand, so he tries to disperse her artwork. // The Deer Squad have a race to see whose cart is the fastest, but Sir Steel unexpectedly join in with his Steelmobile!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep103
programme.desc: To The Lighthouse / The Golden Giant - When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea. // When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Turtle's Shell Day / The Way of the Gran-Gran / The Spring Kick-off Games - Bossy plans a Shell Day party for Turtle without considering what Turtle wants. // Bossy and Turtle learn how to be patient from the Master. // Gran-Gran; Bossy is tired of losing at the Spring Kickoff Games.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Pups Save the Woof and Roll Show / Pups Save an Eagle - When a big pop star comes to town, a storm blows the whole town apart, including the stage! Can the PAW Patrol save the day? // While out in the woods, the pups rescue an eagle caught in twine and tied to her own nest!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Portable Pet Wash - Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Fruit - It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special 'dinosaur' juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep620
programme.desc: George's Balloon - George is finding it difficult to keep hold of his big balloon. Can anyone stop it from flying off to the moon?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure - Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Garden Games - Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Going Boating - Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Mr Bull in a China Shop - While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Paddington's Journey Into A Black Hole/ Paddington's Rainbow Race - When things go missing in Windsor Gardens Jonathan believes a black hole is to blame, so Paddington goes on a space mission. // Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of a rainbow after they break Baaz's kaleidoscope.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep408
programme.desc: A Tale of Shovel & Pail - Siblings Shovel and Pail can't agree on an ending for their storybook! When they get so upset that they stop talking to each other, it's up to Josh, Blue and YOU to figure out a way to get them to resolve the conflict.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Pups Save Jake's Cake / Pups Save a Wild Ride - Ryder and the Pups need to help get a surprise birthday ice cream cake up to Jake's cabin. // Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Raining teddies / Party people - Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest! // Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and The Bad Swap - Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day? // Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Potato Stew - Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Pups Save a Frozen Camp-out / Pups Save the Fizzy Pickles - Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits! // Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to POP.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pluck-O-Matic / Pups Save a Mascot - Yumi's new Robo- Corn Plucker goes haywire, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol must get it under control. // Daring Danny X, dressed as a "Bird X" mascot for the Adventure Bay, gets carried away by a couple of eagles who mistake him for one of their own!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Ultimate Hype Bear / The Chrysalis Crew / Just Say No - Bissy is meeting her favorite band, but Bossy tags along. // Bossy and Turtle find a chrysalis. // Turtle has trouble telling his friends no.

programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin - When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Three is a Magic Number / Off the Map - With the help of El Guardin, the crew solves the puzzle of their new headquarters in order to unlock a secret treasure. // The crew journey to the unknown corners of the ocean and discover a real-life Sea Monster who needs their help.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Dr. Abuela - When Barbarito steals Doctora Abuela's ship and traps Santi and his crew, Tina and Abuela must save the day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Olden Days - Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Snowy Mountain - Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Muddy Puddles - It's raining and Peppa is sad because she can't go out to play. When the rain stops, Peppa feels better and she and George get ready to play one of their favorite games - jumping in mud puddles!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Mr Dinosaur is Lost - George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Best Friend - Peppa Pig's best friend, Suzy Sheep, comes over to visit.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Campfire Stories - It's a campout under the stars! Blaze, AJ, Starla, Crusher, and Pickle are gathered around the campfire to tell the most amazing stories they can make up! And the best part? Whoever tells the best story wins the last marshmallow!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Superwheels! - Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!

programme.desc: Pups Save a Teeny Penguin / Pups Save the Cat Show - Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge. // Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck! If they're not rounded up, the Cat Show will be ruined.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Pups Save a Playful Dragon / Pups Save the Critters - Buddy, the playful dragon from one of Alex's books, gets out and the pups need to get him back. // Francois's trailer unhooked, and all of his critters have gotten loose!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza / The Present - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Super-Shark - Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Paddingtons Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist - Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday! // Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Paddington's Squirrel Surprise / Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent - Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel's winter nut store, so he invites the wild animal to live indoors. programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Rainbow Puppy's Big Farm Fair - Welcome to the Great Farm Fair! There's food, games and even a Piggie talent show! When Rainbow Puppy's piglet Twinkle goes missing at the fair, Josh plays Blue's Clues to find Twinkle and keep her and Rainbow Puppy's blue-ribbon dreams alive.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Captain Steel / Wash Out - Whilst some of the Deer Squad down with flu, Sir Steel tries to become a superhero with disastrous results. // Sir Steel 'borrows' water from Crystal Lake for his Water Park in the city, but things soon go wrong!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Magic Spyglass / The Stone of Life - Santi and crew are after the legendary Magic Spyglass! But things get tricky when Enrique Real de Palacios III joins the chase. / Santi and crew follow a map to a special treasure, but Bonnie and Sir Butterscotch are hot on their trail.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game - When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ultra Shell and Wonder Bear / You Ain't Seen Nothing Yeti / Powerless - Bossy helps Turtle's Biggest Dream Come True: being a superhero! // Bossy and Turtle go camping and learn the story of the magical Yeti. // With the power out, Bossy's family must find a way to keep themselves entertained.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sleepover / Pups Save the Carnival - Farmer Al's animals go missing during a sleepover. // Cornelius has escaped from the pig ride at the carnival, and the prizes have gone missing too!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Floating Goodways - The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Piggy in the Middle - Peppa teaches George how to catch a ball, and later, they play Monkey in the Middle with Mummy Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit in Space - Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Peppa's Circus - Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep624
programme.desc: The Fish Pond - Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep172
programme.desc: Everywhere at Once - Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep174
programme.desc: Achoo ! - Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep408
programme.desc: A Tale of Shovel & Pail - Siblings Shovel and Pail can't agree on an ending for their storybook! When they get so upset that they stop talking to each other, it's up to Josh, Blue and YOU to figure out a way to get them to resolve the conflict.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Pups Save Jake's Cake / Pups Save a Wild Ride - Ryder and the Pups need to help get a surprise birthday ice cream cake up to Jake's cabin. // Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Pups Save an Out of Control Mini Patrol - Alex and his Mini-Patrol accidentally take off on Daring Danny's rocket bike!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep106

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and The Bad Swap - Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day? // Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 8 - Western Bulldogs v Sydney Ep36
programme.desc: In Round 8 of the 10 game AFLW home-and-away season, the Western Bulldogs host the Sydney Swans at the Dogs' historic home ground Whitten Oval. The Bulldogs are winless this season while the Swans have 3 wins and 4 losses.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 8 - Brisbane Lions v Adelaide Crows Ep37
programme.desc: The fourth placed Brisbane Lions host top of the table Adelaide. The Crows are the only team that remain undefeated so far this season, while the Lions have 5 wins and 2 losses. Expect Finals-time intensity three weeks early.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 8 - Port Adelaide v Gold Coast Suns Ep38
programme.desc: In the AFLW's Indigenous Round, Yartapuulti (aka Port Adelaide) host the Gold Coast Suns at Port Adelaide's spiritual home ground, Alberton Oval. The Power have one win this season while the Suns sit 7th with 4 wins.

programme.title: Aussie Bull Catchers Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - On the eve of their first pay day, Liz and Willie draft their cattle but come up painfully short. Legendary outback 'ringer', Kurt Hammar has built a $40 million dollar empire. At the Katherine show, Kurt flexes his muscles.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Newtown Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Warehouse living in the buzzy inner city was a long held dream for Anita and Kris after years of living in Sydney's suburban south. When the old Newtown Hat Factory comes on the market, they jump in, dazzled by its potential.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep29
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Jane visits a community restoring storm affected plots, Costa tours a heritage-listed garden, Tammy plants up a bromeliad basket, Jerry lifts the lid on compost critters, plus we meet a home gardener producing food for chefs.

programme.title: Inside The Sydney Opera House - The Show Must Go On Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - It's the countdown to New Year's Eve as the famous fireworks almost didn't happen off the Sydney Opera House sails. Backstage, Opera Australia battles while scrambling for singers and crew as COVID-19 bites.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Our Urban Birds - Sydney Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Nature journalist Ann Jones is on an urban safari through Sydney to discover the secret lives of the city's feathery friends. From clever-cockies to 'bin-chickens' - Ann uncovers how interconnected we are with our city birds.

programme.title: Four Corners - Trapped Ep38
programme.desc: Inside the hidden system locking people up indefinitely. Four Corners reveals allegations of the torture and mistreatment of people living with disabilities and mental illness who are locked up indefinitely by the state.

programme.title: Australian Story - His Brilliant Careers (Update) - Sam Neill Ep26
programme.desc: When beloved film and TV star Sam Neill received a shock diagnosis, it forced him to take stock of his life. Now the actor is living with a rare disease, but it hasn't stopped him doing the work he loves.

programme.title: Kitchen Cabinet - Peter Dutton Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 7 - Annabel Crabb meets Peter Dutton to find out what makes this former Queensland cop turned political hardman tick. No stranger to controversy, Dutton explains how a self-confessed shy kid became the Leader of the Opposition.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep84
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep37
programme.desc: Israel-Hamas war; No to Voice; ABC defames commando.

programme.title: The Heart Guy - Save The Best For Last Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 5 - Love comes to Whyhope: Meryl and Michael find a way through their past, Hayley and Ajax start afresh under the stars, Charlie and Matt get hitched again, and Hugh leaves with Sharna to start a new life in Sydney.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep84
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.desc: Lisa, Michael and the team chat to best-selling writer John Grisham, rock musician Suzi Quatro, spaceman Chris Hadfield, the Grammy-winning singer and daughter of jazz legend Nina Simone, plus movies with critic Zak Hepburn.

programme.title: Landline Ep36
programme.desc: A return to dairy farming in Far North Queensland, plus the remote station where cattle and conservation co-exist.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep38
programme.desc: A new round of the mortgage wars set to break out as borrowers shop around for deals. Plus more people dropping out of the jobs market and more people with multiple jobs. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep38
programme.desc: Uncertain future as live export woes and oversupply of sheep leave farmers on the brink, jobs in jeopardy as one of Australia's largest copper mines announces its closure, and calls for a cull as feral horse numbers explode.

programme.title: National Press Club Address - Professor Richard Holden - Australian Economist Ep38
programme.desc: Richard Holden, Professor of Economics at UNSW Business School, addresses the National Press Club on the topic 'Is Australian Economic Exceptionalism Over?'.

programme.desc: A return to dairy farming in Far North Queensland, plus the remote station where cattle and conservation co-exist.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast Ep43
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Kathryn Robinson and Jeremy Fernandez, plus sport with Daniela Intili.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast Ep43
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus finance with David Chau and sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Insiders - Simon Birmingham - Shadow Foreign Minister Ep37
programme.desc: David Speers is joined by Clare Armstrong, Mark Kenny, Tom Crowley and Carly Williams to discuss what comes next after the Voice referendum was defeated. Plus the Israel-Gaza war, EV tax and PM Albanese's trip to Washington.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep41
programme.desc: Kelli Underwood and the panel Sam Lewis, Gideon Haigh and Simon Hill discuss the start of the A-League and WBBL seasons plus the latest from the Cricket World Cup.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep40
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Sam Wykes and Tinirau Arona welcome UFC fighter Tyson Pedro and NRLW player Shontelle Stowers, as they recap the Rugby League Pacific Championships, Rugby World Cup and more Pacific sports action.

programme.title: ABC News Ep85
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch throughout the day with ABC News. We bring you the headlines and latest on the day's top stories, plus breaking news and live reports from the scene as events unfold.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep37

programme.desc: When beloved film and TV star Sam Neill received a shock diagnosis, it forced him to take stock of his life. Now the actor is living with a rare disease, but it hasn't stopped him doing the work he loves.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 8 - Collingwood v Geelong Ep39
programme.desc: Sunday Footy returns to the historic Victoria Park as Collingwood host Geelong in Round 8 of the AFLW. Both teams have four wins and three losses, with the Magpies in 8th spot and the Cats 6th as they vie for Finals spots.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 8 - Fremantle v St Kilda Ep40
programme.desc: In the AFLW's Indigenous Round, Yartapuulti (Fremantle) host St Kilda at Fremantle Oval. The Dockers sit 13th with 3 wins 4 losses but are just one win outside the Top 8, while the Saints have won 4 in a row to climb to 10th.

programme.title: Landline Ep37
programme.desc: The impact on the honeybee industry of living with varroa mite; Lumpy Skin Disease disrupting cattle trade with Indonesia; plus the big investment in Australian grown and made popcorn.

programme.title: Compass - Chloe and the Happily Ever After Ep20
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - Chloe Hayden was diagnosed as autistic at the age of 13 and was selective mute for many years. With a passion for Disney princesses, Chloe found her voice online as a 'princess' and now stars as Quinni in Heartbreak High.

programme.title: Planet America: Fireside Chat Ep11
programme.desc: President Joe Biden seeks billions for Israel and Ukraine in a rare Oval Office address. Plus the frontrunners who fizzled in the race for the White House, and still no speaker as the battle descends into death threats.

programme.title: Road Kill Warriors
programme.desc: 400,000 animals are killed on Tasmanian roads every year. That's 45 every hour. Meet the women who have decided that enough is enough and are tackling this issue in unique and sometimes controversial ways.

programme.title: First Weapons - Wartilykirri Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Australia's most lethal boomerang, the Wartilykirri. Host Phil Breslin and weapon maker Joseph Williams unpack this non-returning boomerang and witness its manoeuvrability and force in a medieval battle. (Final)

programme.title: Stuff The British Stole - The Return Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - For well over a century the remains of Yagan, an Indigenous Noongar warrior from WA, were missing in the UK. The search for Yagan and the fight to bring him home is one of history's wildest detective stories. (Final)

programme.title: The Dark Side Of The Universe
programme.desc: We live in a spectacular world. And yet everything we have ever seen, felt, or touched adds up to just five per cent of everything there is. Prof Tamara Davis meets scientists leading the hunt for the dark universe.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Coast - Coast Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Australia is an island continent boasting nearly 35,000 kilometres of coastline. Humans come to the seaside to relax, but for tens of thousands of species that live and breed on our coast, it's a battleground.

programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Warehouse living in the buzzy inner city was a long held dream for Anita and Kris after years of living in Sydney's suburban south. When the old Newtown Hat Factory comes on the market, they jump in, dazzled by its potential.

programme.title: Road Kill Warriors
programme.desc: 400,000 animals are killed on Tasmanian roads every year. That's 45 every hour. Meet the women who have decided that enough is enough and are tackling this issue in unique and sometimes controversial ways.

programme.title: Landline Ep37
programme.desc: The impact on the honeybee industry of living with varroa mite; Lumpy Skin Disease disrupting cattle trade with Indonesia; plus the big investment in Australian grown and made popcorn.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep191
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep211
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Drum Ep196
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel sharing a range of perspectives. Presented by Julia Baird.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep211
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep165
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep211
programme.desc: More news, more often: the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters uncover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep153
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep211
programme.desc: Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Kitchen Cabinet - Peter Dutton Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 7 - Annabel Crabb meets Peter Dutton to find out what makes this former Queensland cop turned political hardman tick. No stranger to controversy, Dutton explains how a self-confessed shy kid became the Leader of the Opposition.

programme.title: The World Ep211
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Q+A Ep35
programme.desc: Sr. 16 - Tackling Australia's climate and environment crisis. The return of El Nino is likely to bring drought, bushfires and heatwaves. Governments across the globe see climate change as a threat to security - how should we respond?

programme.title: 7.30 Ep165
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep211
programme.desc: Follow the story with the latest on the day's events, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Jade Barker.

programme.title: Aussie Bull Catchers Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - On the eve of their first pay day, Liz and Willie draft their cattle but come up painfully short. Legendary outback 'ringer', Kurt Hammar has built a $40 million dollar empire. At the Katherine show, Kurt flexes his muscles.

programme.title: First Weapons - Wartilykirri Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Australia's most lethal boomerang, the Wartilykirri. Host Phil Breslin and weapon maker Joseph Williams unpack this non-returning boomerang and witness its manoeuvrability and force in a medieval battle. (Final)

programme.title: Samurai Wisdom ?Date Masamune?
programme.desc: Despite losing an eye to illness, Date Masamune crossed swords with powerful foes. Learn from the wisdom of this ruler who built a prosperous domain - man of culture known for his aesthetic sense.

programme.title: The Quest For Ancient Color
programme.desc: Japan's Classical period featured stunning natural colors and dyeing techniques. A fifth-generation Kyoto dye craftsman is rediscovering this tradition, resulting in a rich expression of hues.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep905AdesanyavsVettori2
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC at 185 pounds, reigning middleweight champion Israel Adesanya defends his title in a rematch against the The Italian Dream Marvin Vettori at UFC 263. See both men train and prepare to fight for UFC middleweight gold.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC274OliveiravsGaethje
programme.desc: Two titles were on the line at UFC 274 as Charles Oliveira faced off against Justin Gaethje and Rose Namajunas took on Carla Esparza in a rematch of their Ultimate Fighter Finale bout. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep6

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yusuff vs. Barboza
programme.desc: Prelims - An elite featherweight talent readying his assault on the Top 10 at 145 pounds, Sodiq Yusuff has one more roadblock in his way in the form of feared striker Edson Barboza, who he meets in the October 14 main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Capable of ending a fight with one punch, kick, elbow or knee, Brazils Barboza is coming off a memorable knockout of Billy Quarantillo in April, and he has similar plans for Yusuff, whose back-to-back wins over Alex Caceres and Don Shainis have him in prime form.
